name: The Bigboyband
description:
Are you cold and miserable and tired and frumpy inside your damp and lonely hovels?
Everyone's favourite band of absolute sweethearts the BigBoyBand are back once again to bring warmth and joy and music with: Winter Wonderland.
Uplifting!
Heartwarming!
And as always, bandleader Seth Boy has special fun secret super cool twists gimmicks activities up his sleeve, come to the Rogue on Thursday the 24th of July 9pm to find out : ) $10 online / $15 door sales / + raffle tix maybe?

id: Rogue Sunday Jazz - Emma Hattaway-The Rogue & Vagabond-Rogue & Vagabond
name: Rogue Sunday Jazz - Emma Hattaway
description:
The Rogue's regular Sunday afternoon jazz.
Funky, jazzy, soulful jazz.
Beer, hangs, and jazz, on a Sunday, perfect!
This week featuring local bassist Emma Hattaway and her band.
Join Emma and friends for an evening celebrating two of jazz’s most original voices.

id: The Hip Town Bangers-The Rogue & Vagabond-Rogue & Vagabond
name: The Hip Town Bangers
description:
Wellington's hardest swinging quintet are back for another round at The Rogue and Vagabond.
Last time was so much fun we just had to go in again!
Featuring: Chris Buckland - tenor saxophone Ben Hunt - trumpet Anita Schwabe - piano Emma Hattaway - bass Mike Jensen - drums Music from 9pm - FREE ENTRY, Koha for the band welcome!

name: Bojack Funkman
description:
Fronted by Ben Hunt, Kaito Walley, and Eilish Wilson (aka the Horn Section of Doom) with an all-star cast of rhythm section virtuosos, this crossover episode brings together Lettuce, Dave Guy, Ezra Collective, and some hometown bangers.
Stay home?
Neigh way, José!
Special guests: Jade Merematira (vocals) and Louis TM (vocals/keys) Also featuring: Ben Hunt - trumpet Kaito Walley - trombone Eilish Wilson - saxophone Petar Tavich - guitar Emma Hattaway - bass Jacob Randall - drums Music from 9:30, FREE ENTRY, koha for the band encouraged

name: ABACUS
description:
ABACUS is back at The Rogue & Vagabond on Thursday the 7th of August for a night you won’t forget!
ABACUS is an ensemble brought together by their shared love of the music of Brazil.
Brush up on your Portuguese and get ready to dance and sing along to tunes by legends like Tom Jobim, Jorge Ben Jor, Novos Baianos, and many more!
Featuring the talents of: Alex Scott-Billing: Guitar Lily Atu: Vocals / Saxophone Star Stephens: Trumpet/ Vocals Elina Chester: Keys Jono Benzur: Bass Eric Sebastian: Percussion Ranu Wijesuriya: Drums FREE ENTRY– music from 9 PM.
Don’t miss out!

id: Undubbed Goes Rogue-The Rogue & Vagabond-Rogue & Vagabond
name: Undubbed Goes Rogue
description:
An unpredictable live show blending electronica, breakbeat, hip-hop, and jazz improvisation.
UNDUBBED.
is a three-piece band featuring Blair Gowan (keys), Ciaran Egan (drums), and Alex Cooper (bass).
Join them for a snug winter's night at the Rogue and Vagabond, where head-nod beats meet cinematic soundscapes.
Music from 9:00, FREE ENTRY

id: The Wellington City Shake-em-on-Downers-The Rogue & Vagabond-Rogue & Vagabond
name: The Wellington City Shake-em-on-Downers
description:
From amidst the wreckage of our capitalist wasteland they rise, like a phoenix soaring through a bowl of molasses...
The Wellington City Shake-em-on-Downers ARE BACK proving themselves to be the most resilient life form on the planet, giving even the cockroaches a run for their money.
Middle New Zealand's favourite dadaist swing cult phenomenon are back with a vengeance, serving up a fiery primordial soup of fresh tunes for your listening and dancing 'pleasure'.
Prepare for the stupidest gags, hottest horn solos, stonkiest grooves and pea-brained banter as we reign supreme in the battle of wits and people's attention against the existential crisis rectangle, otherwise know as the iPhone.
Don't miss this exuberant show, or you may regret it for the rest of your miserable life.

id: Vincent Vega Plays Tarintino-The Rogue & Vagabond-Rogue & Vagabond
name: Vincent Vega Plays Tarintino
description:
A night of surf, soul and rockn'roll bangers from Quentin Tarantino's cult classic films, played with great vengeance & furious anger by Wellingtons favourite surf-rock saviours Vincent Vega.
Expect tunes from Pulp Fiction, Reservoir Dogs, Once Upon A Time In Hollywood, The Hateful Eight, Death Proof and more.
Featuring special guests Lisa Tomlins on vocals and Louis TM on keys and vocals, as well as the usual suspects in Richard Te One (drums), Nick Lissette (bass) and Chris Armour (guitar) Music from 9:30pm, FREE ENTRY
